1678410.name: They All Come Back
1678410.description:
Get ready to fight for survival in this intense, first-person shooter set in a world overrun by zombies. In this rogue-like game, you'll face off against hordes of the undead as you navigate procedurally generated levels and attempt to stay alive.

Equip yourself with a wide range of powerful weapons, from shotguns and rifles to explosives and melee weapons, as you fight to stay alive. Climb the leaderboards and prove your skills as you battle to be the last survivor standing.

Do you have what it takes to outsmart and outfight the undead? Play now and find out!"
1678410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
